name: Decoding the Cards
notes: Determine the suit using the pigeonhole principle and determine the denomination by using an encoding-decoding system through adding value of given card mod 13.

name: Two Cards from Deck
notes: Calculate the probability of drawing an ace on the first draw i.e. P(Ace on 1st draw) = Number of aces/Deck multiplied by the probability of drawing another ace P(Ace on 2nd draw) = Number of remaining aces/Remaining cards in deck.

name: Drawing a Pair
notes: Draing any of the first card from a standard deck multiplied by drawing remaining three other cards with the same rank in the deck.

name: Coin Flipping Game
notes: Geometric series. P[A] = sum_{k=1 3 5}^inf p x frac{1-p}{2}^{(k-1)/2}.

name: Exactly One Head
notes: Exclude the outcome where all three are tails (TTT).

name: Tossing Ten
notes: Fibonacci pattern where Fn = F_(n-1) + F_(n-2)
column7: as coin problems lend itself to the Fibonacci pattern.
